entry.data:
SUNNY THIS MORNING, THEN PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF FLURRIES THIS AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 14
WEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 20S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 10 ABOVE
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING SOUTHWEST AFTER MIDNIGHT

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 20S

PARTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 40 PERCENT CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S

PARTLY SUNNY WITH A 30 PERCENT CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
